meta.name: Fire Country
meta.description: In Fire Country, seeking redemption and a shortened prison sentence, young convict Bode Donovan joins a firefighting program that returns him to his small Northern California hometown, where he and other inmates work alongside elite firefighters to extinguish massive blazes across the region.

videos.title: Fresh Start
videos.overview: Bode participates in a high school drunk-driving drill that unexpectedly reconnects him with a former classmate; Three Rock reopens with a new crew and high hopes.

videos.title: Who Owns the Dirt
videos.overview: When a red flag warning sets the stage for a volatile day, a turf war between Station 42 and neighboring Drake County comes to a head.

videos.title: Best Mom In The World
videos.overview: Sharon is blindsided by a visit from her estranged mother, Ruby, whose sudden reappearance stirs up painful family history; Bode and Jake respond to a call from a troubled teen in a condemned building.

videos.title: Pilot
videos.overview: Five years ago, Bode burned down everything in his life, leaving town with a big secret. Now he's back, with the rap sheet of a criminal and the audacity to believe in a chance for redemption with Cal Fire.

videos.title: The Fresh Prince of Edgewater
videos.overview: After Bode requests to be transferred to a different city, his future in Edgewater hangs in the balance. Meanwhile, the crew joins forces to protect the town from a treacherous storm.

videos.title: Where There's Smoke...
videos.overview: When the crew responds to a call in a remote forest, they come under fire by an outlaw protecting illegal marijuana crops.

videos.title: Work, Don't Worry
videos.overview: The crew engages in a search and rescue mission after a building collapses and Division Chief Sharon is forced to make a gut-wrenching decision.

videos.title: Get Some, Be Safe
videos.overview: A vegetation fire gets complicated for the crew when a panicked horse refuses to evacuate a burning barn. Meanwhile, Vince's brother Luke, the Cal Fire communications director, makes a surprise visit in town.

videos.title: Like Old Times
videos.overview: After a hiker falls from a steep cliff, Bode and Jake put aside their differences to make a daring rescue. Also, Sharon reveals devasting news to Bode.

videos.title: Happy to Help
videos.overview: Bode's crew is accused of stealing a designer watch from a fire mop up, and the crew responds to a high-stakes call about an extremely dangerous gas leak.

videos.title: Bad Guy
videos.overview: Vince's judgment is compromised when a harrowing rescue of two siblings triggers emotional memories of the night his daughter died in a car accident.

videos.title: No Good Deed
videos.overview: An internal investigation is launched after a difficult rescue went awry and a life was lost.

videos.title: Get Your Hopes Up
videos.overview: A box truck crashes into the station, causing a power outage and triggering a dangerous fire. Meanwhile, Sharon and Bode's ex-girlfriend, Cara face multiple medical emergencies.

videos.title: Mama Bear
videos.overview: A former inmate firefighter harboring a grudge against Sharon returns to carry out his revenge.

videos.title: Two Pink Lines
videos.overview: Bode and his fellow prison inmate firefighters band together with the civilian station 42 crew to battle a monstrous fire that erupts after a plane crash. Meanwhile, the crews welcome a new member to the family.

videos.title: You Know Your Dragon Best
videos.overview: The crews work to contain a dangerous forest fire and save a group of environmentalists protesting a housing development.

videos.title: A Fair to Remember
videos.overview: The crews respond to mass chaos and injuries when a ride malfunctions at the annual Edgewater town fair. Meanwhile, Sharon receives life-changing news.

videos.title: False Promises
videos.overview: A massive tree falls during a reforestation assignment, threatening Eve's life and forcing Bode to step up and lead the rescue efforts.

videos.title: My Kinda Leader
videos.overview: When a massive and unpredictable wildfire breaks out in neighboring Drake Country, the station 42 and third rock crews are called to help aid in the rescue efforts.

videos.title: A Cry for Help
videos.overview: An internal investigator suspects Jake of being the serial arsonist setting recent fires, so Bode and the crew take it upon themselves to investigate.

videos.title: Off the Rails
videos.overview: The crews respond to the scene of a train crash where the rescue has the potential to spiral out of control when they discover the train is full of illicit cargo.

videos.title: Watch Your Step
videos.overview: The station 42 crew responds to an out-of-control blaze at a wellness retreat, and the third rock crew tries to protect one of their own from a dangerous overdose.

videos.title: At the End of My Rope
videos.overview: The station 42 and third rock crews respond to a deadly explosion at an abandoned mine. Meanwhile, Bode faces a difficult decision that could have serious consequences.

videos.title: Backfire
videos.overview: The station 42 and Three Rock crews are called to a backfire started by a private firefighting company to protect a high-end winery but instead threatens to grow out of control.

videos.title: I Know It Feels Impossible
videos.overview: The station 42 and Three Rock crews face a daring rescue when a massive mudslide tears through Edgewater. Meanwhile, Bode's freedom is on the line at his parole hearing.

videos.title: Something's Coming
videos.overview: Bode is back in prison where he receives some shocking news. Meanwhile, the station 42 crew responds to a massive earthquake that rocks Edgewater to its core.

videos.title: Like Breathing Again
videos.overview: While breaking up a bonfire party, the station 42 crew is called to complete a dangerous and highly complex cave rescue.

videos.title: See You Next Apocalypse
videos.overview: When a family refuses to evacuate their property during a massive wildfire that is escalating quickly, Jake is faced with a heartbreaking decision.

videos.title: Too Many Unknowns
videos.overview: The station 42 and third rock crews respond to a chemical plant after a dangerous toxic spill goes up in flames.

videos.title: This Storm Will Pass
videos.overview: The station 42 crew must protect Edgewater and take cover when an extremely rare and dangerous fire tornado leaves lives in peril.

videos.title: Alert the Sheriff
videos.overview: After a fire camp inmate escapes from Three Rock, the deputy sheriff with a surprising connection to the Leones, Mickey, is called to investigate.

videos.title: A Hail Mary
videos.overview: The future of Three Rock is in jeopardy as public opinion of the camp grows increasingly negative.

videos.title: It's Not Over
videos.overview: With the future of Three Rock in jeopardy, Station 42 and Three Rock host Edgewater's 22nd Annual Firefighters' Ball in an effort to impress the governor and save the camp. Meanwhile, Gabriela's mom, Roberta, makes a surprise appearance at the event.

videos.title: No Future, No Consequences
videos.overview: Station 42 and Three Rock battle a dangerous campaign fire where our heroes struggle with difficult decisions.

videos.title: I Do
videos.overview: Gabriela prepares to walk down the aisle on her wedding day as Bode receives some surprising news.

videos.title: What the Bride Said
videos.overview: In the midst of Gabriela and Diego's wedding, a helicopter crash ignites chaos and the team immediately jumps into action to stop fires and help victims.

videos.title: Firing Squad
videos.overview: Bode receives a life-changing opportunity that could impact his future as a firefighter; Leven Rambin guest stars as Audrey, a former fire camp inmate.

videos.title: Welcome to the Cult
videos.overview: Bode and Gabriela consider confessing a huge secret they have been hiding.

videos.title: Keep Your Cool
videos.overview: The temperature is high and tensions are even higher when the crew has to execute an advanced elevator rescue during a heat-induced power outage.

videos.title: Edgewater's About to Get Real Cozy
videos.overview: Station 42 and Three Rock jump into action when an airplane makes an emergency landing; a firefighter immediately recognizes Bode's raw talent.

videos.title: Not Without My Birds
videos.overview: When a fire breaks out in a park that contains an eagle nest, Station 42 and Three Rock work to rescue the protected species and try to prevent the fire from spreading into town.

videos.title: False Alarm
videos.overview: A false alarm call escalates into a dangerous hostage situation.

videos.title: Promise Me
videos.overview: When a series of dangerous underground zombie fires emerge, the team must protect the town; Eve has a less-than-warm reunion with her estranged father, Elroy Edwards.

videos.title: Coming in Hot
videos.overview: With the Chezem Valley fire blazing out of control, Bode and Audrey must find a way to save themselves; Manny risks his freedom for his missing daughter; and Eve tries to protect her father and their family's ranch.

videos.title: The Leone Way
videos.overview: The Leone men attempt a daring rescue while on a family fishing trip and Sharon faces a tough decision when a baby is safely surrendered at station 42.

videos.title: Fare Thee Well
videos.overview: The crew responds to a call from the local renaissance fair after a fire breather loses their balance and sets off a tent filled with fireworks.

videos.title: I'm the One Who Just Goes Away
videos.overview: While on a risk assessment trip to the Trinity National Forest, Bode and Jake attempt a daring rescue despite avalanche danger.

videos.title: My Team
videos.overview: Station 42 responds to a fire in the dugout before the annual county clash baseball rivalry game. Meanwhile, Vince's ex-girlfriend returns.

videos.title: Death Trap
videos.overview: The station 42 crew responds to a wellness check at the home of a hoarder that escalates into a full-blown house fire, and Vince and Sharon are forced to face the reality of his father's ballooning cognitive troubles.

videos.title: One Last Time
videos.overview: Bode and Jake respond to a lighthouse rescue operation that turns into a mission to prevent a ship from crashing during an intense storm. Meanwhile, Eve investigates the origins of a flu outbreak at Three Rock.

videos.title: Dirty Money
videos.overview: Bode and his aunt, Sheriff Mickey Fox, investigate the attempted murder of her estranged father, Wes Fox.

videos.title: Fire and Ice
videos.overview: The station 42 crew responds to a ski resort accident after a chair lift malfunctions, and Vince struggles to connect with his father.

videos.title: Eyes and Ears Everywhere
videos.overview: The station 42 crew responds to a routine house fire that escalates into a dangerous situation for one of their own.

videos.title: A Change in the Wind
videos.overview: When a fire erupts at a gas station, Bode and Manny jump into action to protect the patrons and property, on part one of the two-hour season finale.

videos.title: I'd Do It Again
videos.overview: Extremely high winds and dangerous conditions push the Zebel Ridge fire into Edgewater, threatening Three Rock and Walter's care facility, on part two of the two-hour season finale.

videos.title: Goodbye for Now
videos.overview: In the aftermath of the Zabel Ridge fire, Station 42 faces internal turmoil but must rally together for a high-stakes rescue that tests their strength, loyalty and the future of the firehouse.

videos.title: Not a Stray
videos.overview: Station 42 faces a high-stakes wildfire situation that tests their unity, leadership and personal resilience; the new battalion chief is on site, but he has a polarizing leadership style that gets under everyone's skin.

videos.title: The Tiny Ways We Start to Heal
videos.overview: The Station 42 team responds to a dangerous zipline accident that escalates into a wildfire due to illegal fireworks; Sharon struggles with letting go of Vince's belongings and unexpectedly finds comfort in Vince's ex, Renee.

videos.title: Like a Wounded Wildebeest
videos.overview: Manny has a serious conversation with Bode about a troubling discovery, urging him to be honest and take responsibility.

videos.title: Happy First Day, Manny
videos.overview: The team responds to a dangerous fire at the local drive-in movie theater where they must enlist civilians to help stop the spread; Bode and Sharon wrestle with the weight of holding secrets from each other.

videos.title: Your Voice in My Head
videos.overview: Station 42 responds to a dangerous fire at a beloved local smokehouse where Jake is forced to confront memories of his late father and the place they once shared.
